description: Tool to translate the Hymnos alphabet from the Hymnos language used in the series of role playing games, manga and anime Ar tonelico.

questions.answer: The Hymnos alphabet has a direct correspondence with the French alphabet (Latin alphabet) for upper case letters and lower case letters. LetterHymnos SymbolLetterHymnos SymbolLetterHymnos SymbolLetterHymnos SymbolABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ  LetterHymnos SymbolLetterHymnos SymbolLetterHymnos SymbolLetterHymnos Symbolabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz Example: dCode is translated  Hymnos is also a language, with words and a grammar that is totally different from ours (the story takes place in the distant future around 3700), dCode does not allow literal translation, only a transcription of characters.
questions.question: How to write using Hymnos?

questions.answer: The first step is the transcription of the Hymnos symbols into letters. Example:  is equivalent to the 6 letters HYMNOS If the message is not intelligible, it may be written in Hymnos language, of which there are some unofficial dictionaries.
questions.question: How to decrypt Hymnos alphabet?

questions.answer: The Hymnos symbols are very complicated, based on circles and arcs of circles. All references to the universe of Ar Tonelico or its author Akira Tsuchiya are clues.
questions.question: How to recognize a Hymnos alphabet ciphertext?

title: Hymnos Alphabet
